name: 6X6 ATV Try-Out
description:
Take up the challenge of this addictive and realistic physics based 6X6 ATV Riding game! Use your skills to drive your 6X6 ATV over rough and treacherous terrain completing all the missions on your way!
It's gonna be a tough ride!
*Many different worlds, each giving the user new challenges to face
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
